abstract: The hedge fund manager William A. Ackman stepped up his fight against fellow directors of J.C. Penney on Friday, publicly calling for the replacement of the chairman and reiterating a demand for a new chief executive.
snippet: The hedge fund manager William A. Ackman stepped up his fight against fellow directors of J.C. Penney on Friday, publicly calling for the replacement of the chairman and reiterating a demand for a new chief executive.
lead_paragraph: William A. Ackman is known as an involved investor. But a public brouhaha with the board of J. C. Penney that sent letters and news releases flying on Thursday and Friday took his activism to new heights.

headline.main: Charges Fly in Feud Over Strategy at Penney

byline.original: By Stephanie Clifford and Michael J. de la Merced
